mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post SET post_id = #{postId}, joint_account_id = #{jointAccountId}, file_url = #{fileUrl}, file_type = #{fileType}, post_text = #{postText}, last_updated_time=now(), created_time=now();
mapper.select: SELECT post_id, joint_account_id, file_url, file_type, post_text, total_rating, no_of_ratings FROM post WHERE joint_account_id=#{value} ORDER BY created_time desc;

SELECT post.post_id, post.joint_account_id, post.file_url, post.file_type, post.post_text, post.total_rating, post.no_of_ratings FROM post INNER JOIN follower ON post.joint_account_id=follower.joint_account_id AND follower.email_id=#{value} ORDER BY post.created_time desc;
SELECT post_id, joint_account_id, file_url, file_type, post_text, total_rating, no_of_ratings FROM post;
